Class PlayBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
      • Box
        • PlayBox

  • public class PlayBox
extends Box
    The PlayBox creates a box that plays the slot machine

    • Method Detail

      • getPushable

        Returns:
        if PlayBox is pushable

      • act

        public void act()
        If the PlayBox button is pushable, when pressed, is will start the slot machine, turning all the reels. It maintains the LightBoxes and ReelBoxes and gives the score and coin account for the ScoreBoxDisplay and CoinAmountBoxDisplay When game is done, it will ask if the game wants to be played again. If so, then the difficulty will be asked. If not, then the game exits.
        Overrides:
        act in class Box
